Hi, 
 I am new to this group. I have a couple of questions on JUnit. 
1. How to run the failed test cases and test suites in the second time. Is there any automated way to identify the failed test cases and execute only those failed in the second time? 
2. Is it possible to create a project in which I could create various test suites, each for each components in my product, and run the test cases of all the suites?
Thanks in Advance,
Sasikala.
